text:
http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/0.93/releaseNotes_0.93.html

The title is "Release Notes for Apache Forrest 0.93" instead of FOP 0.93. I
guess there is some Forrest config file to change somewhere, but don't know
which one right now. Creating a Bugzilla entry to not forget it.
